channel.title: [508] Major Server Development!
channel.description:
Hello, and welcome to the development team of ServerSoft, 508. I am currently looking for new recruiting members to add to this development team division. Members who have been recruited to the division will recieve these exclusive benefits:
1. Access to the Server GUI (Graphical User Interface) which can Ban, IP-Ban, Mute, IP-Mute, Kick, Jail, IP-Jail, Promote, Demote, Teleport, and can even add items to the players account. With this GUI, you pretty much have the rights of the server owner.
2. Depending upon the position you have been drafted to, you will most likley have a Gold Administrative Crown by your Username in times of Chat.
3. You will have access to our Exclusive Server Software, which can not be found anywhere else on the internet!
4. You will also recieve IN-Game Benefits, such as Special Commands, Free Membership for as long as your a staff-member, and even special Staff-Only areas.
So why join us? Because! With are many advanced updates, we will attract a wide-range of players. By doing this, our server will be massivley popular. We also have content on our server that NO other server has, and because of this, our server is in-definitley unique.
So, put your:
1. Age:
2. Name:
3. Position:
4. Experience:
5. How you would Benefit the players:

item.title: [508] Major Server Development!
item.dc:creator: @QuestMaster_2K10 QuestMaster 2K10

@QuestMaster_2K10 wrote:

Client Link is: Message me for it

item.title: [508] Major Server Development!
item.dc:creator: @XombeR XombeR
item.description:
@XombeR wrote:

Awesome! Where can I download the client etc?

Read full topic

item.title: [508] Major Server Development!
item.dc:creator: @XombeR XombeR
item.description:
@XombeR wrote:

  1. Age: 20

  2. Name: Simon Uhlin

  3. Position: Anything you believe I would fit for.

  4. Experience: A lot (depends on what sort of experience you are looking for. I have been admin in tons of servers that are shut down now, I have also good experience in VB software development, graphic designing and forum hosting).

  5. How you would Benefit the players:

    • I can keep the server clean from rule-breakers.
    • I am very friendly and supportive.
    • I will be active over 5hours/day.
    • I can host events and other fun stuff for the community.
    • I can create cool softwares, forums and logos.
    • And much more. I always do a good job as Admin (Y)

Read full topic
